title: AUD RP Prices > USD RP Prices
body:
Edit: Misleading title: greater as is in BETTER VALUE not larger in prices. (Realised after I posted the greater symbol probably was a bad one to use)

......

This post is directed at Australians complaining about the RP adjustments that are about to occur. I feel like a major point that hasn't been emphasised is; **WE WILL STILL BE GETTING MORE RP PER DOLLAR THAN THE US!!!!!**

____

Simple Math;
US: 
- $5 USD = 650 RP 
- $5 USD = $6.48 AUD (based on today's conversion rate)
**- 100.3 RP per $1 AUD** 

New AUS prices:
- $5 AUD = 520 RP
**- 104 RP per $1 AUD**

_____

To those complaining that Riot are being unfair or greedy, ask yourself why do you feel you deserve to pay less for RP than other regions? 
Regardless of Riot's reasons, this new amount will be a FAIR amount, based of what every other League player is paying. 

-Skyprus

replies.body: The thing is, Riot could of just raised the amount other servers get yet the chose the other option of lowering it for us, just because we have a weaker dollar, yes now we get pretty much an equal amount **however** Riot chose the option of lowering the amount we get instead of just raising the amount others gets, seems pretty selfish, in any case, this has sealed the deal for me, no more RP purchases from me, I was actually planning on buying on buying $100 worth of RP and I could very well still get that before the amount lowers, but yeah, consider it me just not wanting to fund a greedy company that chose lowering ours over increasing the others, RP is already expensive, it's pretty much $10 or more for a decent skin, anyway I don't care if anyone agrees or not because in my eyes Riot is just greedy.

The OCE region is also quite small in comparison to other reasons. You are expecting Riot to cull their income over all regions because of a small new region getting cheaper RP?  

Your request is unreasonable and not thought through.

> Riot could of just raised the amount other servers get

Which, in turn, would make RP worth less and they would end up raising RP costs of in-game items like champs, skins, bundles etc. causing more people to complain because Riot's "money grabbing". Ultimately that course of action would have the same effect as lowering the amount of RP we get with the added bonus of **everyone** on **every server** complaining.
"Which, in turn, would make RP worth less " rp isn't worth anything to begin with, its just for diff skins which have no bearing outside the game whatsoever
If RP isn't worth anything why are we paying real money for it?
because we are idiots who want to see our little character that we play on the screen to look different? tell me the worth of it
